suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: This pattern is knit up quick with two strands of worsted weight wool held together. Knit one up this weekend. Perfect for Fall, Halloween, and Thanksgiving decor. These also make a great hostess gift or toy stuffy for a little pumpkin lover. Sizes Small (Medium, Large) Approximate Measurements: Small - 9” (23cm) diameter, 5.5” (14cm) tall Medium - 11” (28cm) diameter, 6.5” (16.5cm) tall Large - 13” (33cm) diameter, 7.5” (19cm) tall Pumpkin in featured photo is medium size Notes included in the instructions to make bigger and taller Yarn and Materials Knit with 2 strands of worsted weight yarn held together You will need approximately 122 yd (164 yd, 192 yd) / 112m (150m, 175m) each of 2 colours for the main pumpkin. The stem is also knit with 2 strands held together, you will need a small amount of each colour. Poly-fil: approximately 3.5oz(5.3oz, 7oz) / 100g (150g, 200g) for the main pumpkin and a small amount for the stem Needles, Tools and Notions: Set of US10.5 (6.5mm) Double Point Needles US 10.5 (6.5mm) Circular Needle, 16” (40cm) Removable stitch marker Darning Needle Ribs of the pumpkin are separated by a line of purl stitches which are wrapped with yarn later for shaping. The stem is knit separately and sewn onto the pumpkin at the end.
name: Ravelry: Big Porch Pumpkins pattern by Heather Pelletier
